name: Congruent Info - Tech Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: custom-software-development, mobile-application-development, testing-services, microsoft-dynamics-services, sharepoint-services, saas-application-developement
overview:
Congruent Info Tech is a Global IT Services company which specializes in providing Outsourced Software Development and Systems Integration services to ISVs and Fortune 500 companies alike.

Our customers include a wide range of companies, from a Startup solution provider to well established enterprise like 3M, Starbucks Coffee, Utilities and Transportation Commission, Codexis, Pescado, Maldives Airport, VeePee etc.

We specialize in Offshore Development, Custom Application Development, Product Development for ISV, Consulting, Implementation, Support, Customization & Integration of, Dynamics GP, SL, CRM, NAV, Mobile Development - iPhone, Android, Windows7, Blackberry, Testing Services, SharePoint Services.
